item.title: AI4Humans: Software x LLMs
item.description: Google Slides are here Here is the outline of topics we discussed: AI4Humans: LLMs x Software Systems # Introduction # Hello, I’m Nirant, a machine learning engineer and contributor to AI4Bharat. I’ve had the privilege of working on a range of exciting projects, from publishing an ACL 2020 NLP Paper on Hinglish and writing an NLP book, to contributing to IndicGlue and deploying systems used by Nykaa. I also manage India’s largest GenAI community and regularly host meetups.
